name: Reversing the array in reverse order

0.name: What does it mean to go through the array in reverse order?
Go through the array from end to beginning

1.name: Go through the array from beginning to end

2.name: Walk through the array from right to left

3.name: Walk the array from left to right

1.name: Is it correct that running the code below will print the values of the array elements in reverse order to the console?

0.name: Incorrect, the result will be the indices of the array elements in reverse order - 5 4 3 2 2 1 0

1.name: Correct, the result will be the values of the array elements in reverse order - 5 4 3 2 2 1 Go!

2.name: Incorrect, the result will be the values of the array elements in order - Go! 1 2 3 4 5

3.name: Incorrect, the result will be the indexes of the array elements in order - 0 1 2 3 3 4 5

2.name: Select the correct option to change the for loop conditions below to loop the array in reverse order

9.name: Is it true that the result of running the code below will be an array of element indices - [4, 3, 2, 1, 0]?

0.name: No, the result will be an array of element indices - [4, 2, 0]

1.name: Yes, the result will be an array of element indices - [4, 3, 2, 1, 0]

2.name: No, the result will be an array of element indices - [0, 2, 4]

3.name: No, the result will be an array of element indices - [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]
